description: Defines Cant (Superelevation) at the locations of start and end Cant Ramps on the track.

elementGeometryPos.description: position on the associated track edge

appliedCant.description: Height of the outer rail minus the inner rail. Outer rail and inner rail are defined according to the direction of curve. Rollangle=(arcsin(cant/gauge)), gauge is distance between middle of the railheads, e.g. 1500mm for EU-standard gauge '1435mm' ; The applied cant is defined for the start
